Syllabus

CSCI 479: Computer Science Design Project

After 3 years at Bucknell, you‚Äôve gained an extraordinary amount of technical knowledge. This is your opportunity to own a larger scale project from top to bottom. But more importantly, it‚Äôs an opportunity to figure out a design process that you‚Äôll need for years after graduation. To that end, you will complete a semester-long project for an external client while applying and reflecting on software engineering processes.

  • Who: Prof. Evan Peck | How to meet with me
  • Where and When: There are 2 sections of this course.
    • DANA 117, MWF 1-1:50pm
    • BRKI 166, MWF 2-2:50pm
